pr_title: Return error for already used http:Responses

timeline.body:
`already processed` wording does not specifically say that the response is reused. Shall we rephrase it?
```suggestion
            String errorMessage = "Couldn't complete the respond operation as the response has been already used.";
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
already processed wording does not specifically say that the response is reused. Shall we rephrase it?

Suggested change
String errorMessage = "Couldn't complete the outbound response which has been already processed.";
String errorMessage = "Couldn't complete the respond operation as the response has been already used.";
timeline.author: chamil321

timeline.body: Shall we move this conditional check to a smaller method which has a descriptive method name? So that code will be readable
timeline.bodyText: Shall we move this conditional check to a smaller method which has a descriptive method name? So that code will be readable
